title: Liquidity Sweep Pattern
prompt: Create a trading chart illustrating Liquidity Sweep (stop hunt) concept. Show 15-20 candlesticks with a clear swing low followed by a sweep. Mark the original swing low with horizontal dashed line labeled 'Liquidity Pool / Stop Losses'. Show a wick piercing below this level (the sweep) then reversing sharply - highlight this candle. Add dollar sign icons ($$$) below the swing low representing trapped stops. Label: 'Swing Low', 'Liquidity Sweep', 'Smart Money Entry', 'Reversal'. Show buy arrow after the sweep. Include magnified inset of the sweep candle. Dark background (#0F172A). Use red zone below swing low, green for reversal area. ICT/SMC trading concept style.
negative_prompt: confusing price action, too many annotations, unclear sweep, amateur chart
